quest.name: A Sentimental Gift
journal: You needn't be an entelechy to feel the weight bearing down on Hermes.
objectives: Speak with Meteion and have her accompany you.
Examine flowers at the Twelve Wonders while accompanied by Meteion.
Look for flowers while accompanied by Meteion.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: I fear this discussion may take a while, during which time...

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: Meteion? Are you feeling unwell?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: It's not me, Hermes. It's you...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I won't go to the meeting. I'll stay with Forename.

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: Loath though I am to impose, may I leave Meteion in your care again?

dialogue.name: HERMES
dialogue.text: I'm in your debt. If you'll excuse me...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Can you help me with something, Forename?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: The meeting will make Hermes sad. I want to cheer him up. With a flower.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hermes likes flowers the most. Of all the creations in Elpis.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Most creations are expected to be interesting. Or beautiful. Or strong. Better in some way.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: But flowers are different. They're designed to suit our emotions. What we feel and want to convey. Hermes likes that.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I can't make flowers. So I'll search for one. And I want you to search with me.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Let's start here. At the Twelve Wonders.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Meteion is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave Meteion behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have Meteion accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Talk.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Part ways.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Let's search the Twelve Wonders first.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with Meteion?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: All right! I'll wait at the building.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hermes is still talking. We still have time!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Meteion has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before you examine the flowers.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You should have Meteion accompanying you before you examine the flowers.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Vibrant purple flowers bigger than your hands adorn the tree.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Oooh, so big and bright! I love them!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: ...But they might be too bright. You have to think of the recipient. That's what Hermes said.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Let's head outside next. Don't worry─we won't wander far.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A tall, slender tree rises before you. You crane your neck to look for flowers.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: No flowers... If there were apples, we could've covered them in syrup...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Let's head outside next. Don't worry─we won't wander far.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Lots of flowers in the fields. We should be able to find something nice!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You should have Meteion accompanying you before you look for flowers.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: An array of beautiful flowers grow in the bed, their mix of colors forming a pattern.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: These would be better for Hermes...but they're hedged in.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: That means we shouldn't touch them. They're either under observation or poisonous.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Any other place should be fine, though. Let's keep looking!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Vibrant or subdued...? Interesting or plain...? Hmmm...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Set on a tall, thin stalk, the oddly shaped flower is mesmerizing in its undulations...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Oh, a coneion! A flower that can move!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: When Hermes wasn't looking, it shot seeds at him. Not a good gift, maybe...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: But you're good, Forename─at spotting flowers! We'll find something soon!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: You're good at observing, Forename. Just like an observer!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You spy nothing promising nearby. At best, common-looking grasses with some few tiny flowers...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hmmm, nothing around here... Ah!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Over there, Forename! Something big! Huge!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Come on, let's get closer! But not too close!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A terrible stench reminiscent of sodden old boots pervades the air... Without a doubt, the culprit is the morbol-like creature before you.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: It's an adonis! The things around its mouth look like petals. But the flowers are the orbs on its head!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: When Hermes inspected it, it swallowed him up. He didn't leave his room for days. What do you think, Forename? Would he like it?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: It's probably not the good sort of memory...

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: I'd rather not go near that thing...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: So not this one either...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Finding a good flower... It's harder than I thought.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, Forename, but could we search a little more? Maybe as far as the fields over there. I'll pick something after that, I promise.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I've never given a gift before... Were you nervous too? For your first time?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Lush, green fields stretch out before you, ending where the sky begins...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Awww... There's nothing...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: ...Hm? The shiny thing over there. What could it be?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I learned something new recently─the meaning of Philomythes Notos!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: “Notos” is a south wind person...and “Philomythes” is his joy! Why is he joyful? Because this place is so beautiful!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Ooh, Elpis flowers! They're here too!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hermes likes and dislikes them. At the same time.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Like me, they're entelechies. Like me, they feel his pain and turn dark...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: That's only for Hermes, though. For others, they're always white and bright.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Truly!? The flower was dark in your home!?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Then...do you have it too? A dark emotion?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I've known the pain and sorrow of loss.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I've felt great fury and frustration.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I've been plagued by doubt and anxiety.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I daresay I have a few.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I see...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hermes has known the same. The feeling that a part of you is gone. Again and again. But no one notices...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Please, Forename. Won't you lend it to me? Your pain and sorrow...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I see...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hermes has felt the same. A fire burning in your breast. A trembling hand. But no one understands...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Please, Forename. Won't you lend them to me? Your fury and frustration...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I see...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Hermes has felt the same. A shortness of breath. The walls closer and closer. But only him. No one else feels it...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Please, Forename. Won't you lend them to me? Your doubt and anxiety...

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: You don't have to say it. I can feel it's something you want to hide.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: But won't you lend it to me? The darkness inside you?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I want you to make the flower dark. In front of Hermes.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: He has been in a dark place. Since before he created me. He needs to know that he isn't there alone. That others are sad too.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Truly? You'll do it?

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename! Thank you! It means more to me than I can say!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: I can't wait to see how Hermes reacts! Let's go back and fetch him!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: It seems they're still talking. Let's wait until they've finished.
